title: Nee Dhana Lyrics Madha Gaja Raja Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
Singers(s):Vijay Antony
Lyrics: Pa. Vijay
Movie: Madha Gaja Raja
Music: Vijay Antony		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
en nenjil pani mazhai peidhadhu
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
en uyirai mirudhuvaai neidhadhu

Ovvoru nimisham unnaiye ninaithu
nenjukul erippaai yosithaen

enbadhum iravaa
iravupin pagalaa
irandukkum naduvil swaasithaen
Kaalai saalayil
neeyum naanum
nadapadhu polave yosithaen

Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
en nenjil pani mazhai peidhadhu
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
Nee Dhana Nee Dhana
en uyirai mirudhuvaai neidhadhu

en pagal endhan pagal
hey nee dhana nee dhana
mun andhi mudhal mazhai
hey neethaana neethaana
vennira iravugal
hey neethaana neethaana
velandhi paravayum
neethaana hey neethaana

imisaigal seidhaai neethaana

oruvari puthagam
neethaana neethaana
oru thuli adaimazhai
neethaana ai neethaana
azhagukku aaramabam
neethaana hey neethaana
ilamayin boogambam
neethaana neethaana
